> [tkarita](#comment_5_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): nimda: ZeroNet can't handle filenames with spaces or brackets.  The ZeroTorrent interface isn't aware of that, so it probably said your torrents were uploaded.  They're actually broken links.  Do you have magnet links?

Hi,

i will post the torrent files again without spaces or brackets. Thanks for bringing this to my attention...
